name: Bloodline (itch) (TK)
description:
You wake up, and you're...

...your own ancestors?  Change the past for your future selves and get to the portal!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WAD or <^>

Caveman: Breaks cracked stone!

Knight: Breaks wooden planks!

Industrial: Creates dangerous smoke!

Modern: Just get to the end!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:
